name: Properties in map

files.filename: Delegated properties/Properties in map/Properties in map.kt

help: Properties stored in a map. This comes up a lot in applications like parsing JSON or doing other “dynamic” stuff. Delegates take values from this map (by the string keys – names of properties). Of course, you can have var’s as well (with mapVar() function), that will modify the map upon assignment (note that you’d need MutableMap instead of read-only Map).
